data.text: @sweidanmd @phil_w888 @dawoodbanday @IM_Crit_ @LittleW99300122 @phlegmfighter Thank you 😊 I do not want to take up your time, but I would be grateful to know what you mean for "vastly clinically different" because I keep reading that Evali is just a diagnosis of exclusion (mainly based on a negative Covid test). https://t.co/GSqVwL3wJn
@sweidanmd @phil_w888 @dawoodbanday @IM_Crit_ @LittleW99300122 @phlegmfighter In that thread I linked many other common features of Evali and Covid. Hope you can find some time to check them.

@Rossana38510044 @phil_w888 @dawoodbanday @IM_Crit_ @LittleW99300122 @phlegmfighter You do a great job reviewing and providing evidence for it. I am not sure how to explain it further. But they are vastly clinically different. Quite easy to tell the difference in the clinical setting with history and other labs.

@sweidanmd @phil_w888 @dawoodbanday @IM_Crit_ @LittleW99300122 @phlegmfighter I am sorry to bombard you with so many links, but Evali looks just like Covid to me. I can imagine that the original strain might have been less pathogenic and therefore severe pneumonia was mostly observed in people vaping (therefore more in younger people).

@Rossana38510044 @sweidanmd @phil_w888 @dawoodbanday @IM_Crit_ @LittleW99300122 @phlegmfighter If you don't know the difference, ask Scott. Jumping from a bridge and vaping is as deadly, as jumping from a bridge alone. https://t.co/YBWXSNnp02

@sweidanmd @phil_w888 @dawoodbanday @IM_Crit_ @LittleW99300122 @phlegmfighter "Older age, being a smoker or former smoker, and having cardiovascular disease (CVD) or a respiratory condition were also strongly associated with death from EVALI"
https://t.co/YKUIuvtaV4

@sweidanmd @phil_w888 @dawoodbanday @IM_Crit_ @LittleW99300122 @phlegmfighter Obesity common in fatal cases of EVALI, just like for Covid
https://t.co/7q4wYIpKFp
